node.html: A TMUX plugin that makes new windows and panes inherit the active conda environment of the parent shell! 'conda activate' commands can really pile up... Works with both bash and zsh!
A simple Billiard game university project, made with OpenGL and C++ featuring a custom physics library.

Finalist at the first Coventry Game Jam. The players control a number of characters in a map filled with various obstacles and hazards to rapidly prepare objects to specific orders under a time limit.
